column4: hey i'm trying to mount a squashfs 1.0 img and in my dmesg I'm getting "Squashfs 1.0 filesystems are unsupported" any ideas?
i have all the squashfs packages intalled. squashfs-tools is the first thing i installed and it still doesn't mount squashfs 1.0 filesystems
what is squashfs used for anyways ?
